Could not send registration (technical error) Currency [%s] already exists. Enter node info Enter remote address Add node Please enter either a full qualified domain name, an IPv4, or an IPv6 address, and a port number Identity user or public key User identifier (UID) Identity icon Certified by Certifiers of Registration Date Signature Public key Details Community --> Login Next Password Confirm Confirm password PIN code Add account Add wallet New wallet Salt Salt: We advice you to choose your personal e-mail as value for this field. But you can put any other value: it only has to carry enough entropy to avoid key collision. Typically, your personal e-mail is a good choice, added to the fact it is easy to remember. Password: Choose a very strong password, so no one can find it. This password can\'t be changed thereafter, so choose it carefully. Test Name (optional) New contact (%s) This login is too short One of name or user ID is required This name is too short This salt is too short This password is too short This login is incorrect This password is incorrect This field is required Salt and password already used by another wallet This UID match another public key. Choose another UID or check your salt and password. User ID: If you choose an UID which is already used inside a community, you won\'t be able to join this community. So ensure not to collide with someone else\'s UID. UID cannot be empty Salt cannot be empty Password cannot be empty Confirm password cannot be empty Passwords don\'t match Insufficient credit on wallet A wallet with the same public key already exists. %s characters minimum Transfer to %s Sign %s yesterday Forum @string/home @string/currencies @string/forum @string/settings
